posts.title: Second Post: More Examples
posts.excerpt: Minimal frontmatter using defaults for subtitle and image. This article shows multiple fenced code examples and headings. The info callout renders via MDX.
posts.content: Minimal frontmatter using defaults for subtitle and image. This article shows multiple fenced code examples and headings. The info callout renders via MDX. Video Diagram graph TD A[Start] --> B{Is it working?} B -- Yes --> C[Ship it] B -- No --> D[Fix it] D --> B Programming Languages Let's try out different Programming Languages TypeScript export default function Component() { return Click ; } export default function Component() { return Click ; } Python from functools import wraps def mydecorator(func): @wraps(func) def decorator(args, kwargs): print("do something before") result = func(args, **kwargs) print("do something after") return result return decorator

posts.content: Welcome to my blog! Below are some code examples. TypeScript type User = { id: string; name: string }; export function greet(user: User) { return Hello, ${user.name}!; } console.log(greet({ id: "1", name: "Ada" })); npm ci npm run dev Tweets or
